messages.subject: Re: welcome back
messages.msgSnippet: ... Time, ... after 7 ... Without you! I had always wondered if that were possible. Some thought it couldn t be done. Lucky you guys, it probably would have
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, kbcdlovejo@a...
wrote:
> In a message dated 1/6/2003 7:00:10 PM Eastern Standard
Time,
> pamhartley@m... writes:
> > Pam, finally ready to play again after catching up on real life
after 7
> > weeks of jury duty. <g>
>
> We've MISSED you!
>
> Glad you're back. We even had some "dog talk" recently.
Without you!


I had always wondered if that were possible. Some thought it
couldn't be done. Lucky you guys, it probably would have gone on
longer if I'd been here for it! <g>

Glad to be back! Thanks for the notes, all.

Pam

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] welcome back
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/6/2003 7:00:10 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... We ve MISSED you! Glad you re back. We even had some dog talk recently. Without you! ~Kelly
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/6/2003 7:00:10 PM Eastern Standard Time,
pamhartley@... writes:
> Pam, finally ready to play again after catching up on real life after 7
> weeks of jury duty. <g>

We've MISSED you!

Glad you're back. We even had some "dog talk" recently. Without you!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
